index.description: Rousing Software Engineer focused on web technologies. I help companies deliver software from ideation to production. I share my knowledge with my peers to help them succeed in their role while maintaining alignment with the company goals.

about.heading: üëãüèº Hi! I'm Mario
about.p1: Rousing Software Engineer focused on web technologies.
about.p2: I help companies deliver software from ideation to production. I share my knowledge with my peers to help them succeed in their role while maintaining alignment with the company goals.
about.p3: Centered on potential gains for the company, I'm responsible for 95% reduction in the infrastructure cost last year.
about.p4: In love with cutting-edge technologies, I am mastering {nuxt} and {deno}.
about.p5: I've recently been playing extensively with {websockets} and {webrtc}.
